nodes.text: Harris was a male Duros major of the Galactic Republic living during the Galactic War. Around 3641 BBY Harris was in command of the Ninety-fourth Supply Division and was stationed at the Meltwater Outpost in the High Security Section on Belsavis. He asked a Republic agent in the area to eliminate the escaped Rattataki prisoners that have been making hit-and-run assaults on the Republic forces.
Mahor Harris appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as an NPC on Belsavis, where he begins the mission "Strengthening the Chain."
